body.name: ULANZI iPad Phone Tripod Mount Adapter with Cold Shoe, Universal Smartphone Tablet Holder for Tripod with Arca Quick Release Plate 1/4'' Screw Mount, Compatible for iPhone iPad Surface Pro and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 51 mins
features: Innovative Design: The 2-in-1 smart phone tablet mount adapter that can be adjusted to both sides through the button on the back or the top spring, the width is 2.56"-10.23". Support vertical and horizontal placement of mobile phones and tablets

Multiple Installation Methods: Not only can it be used independently, but it also has a 1/4 screw hole and Arca-Style quick release plate. You Can Install It on Ball Head of Tripod Quickly, suitable for tripods and selfie sticks. It is very suitable for shooting on blogs, INS, and live broadcast on YouTube

Wide Compatibility: The iPad phone stand is suitable for use within the range of 4.7 to 12.9 inches. Suitable for iPhone, iPad Mini, iPad, iPad Air, iPad Pro, Surface Go, most mobile phones or tablets. Note: 13 inch is only suitable for landscape orientation

Cold Shoe Mount: A cold shoe mount is attached to the upper part of this tablet stand, which can be installed with LED video lights, microphones, monitors and many other accessories. Not only can you install a smartphone or GoPro sports camera, but also can be used for professional photography, video conference lighting, video shooting, etc.

Safe and Stable: Made of sturdy ABS material and high-quality aluminum alloy material, it is strong and durable even if used for a long time. The tablet clip uses a V-shaped rubber material to prevent the tablet from being scratched, and it can firmly fix your iPad

What You Get: A portable cellphone iPad 2-in-1 tripod mount, only 95g, easy to carry. ULANZI 100% satisfying and prompt 𝘾𝙪𝙨𝙩𝙤𝙢𝙚𝙧 𝙎𝙚𝙧𝙫𝙞𝙘𝙚. Perfect for Video, Photographers, YouTube, vlogging, live streaming and Family Gathering

Cold Shoe Mount The tablet clamp has its own cold shoe mount design, which allows fixing microphones, photographic lights, and other equipment Non-slip Silicone Pad The phone tripod mount uses high-quality materials, widening, thickening, and enlarged gear design, make your phone more stable and safer Easy to Use The tablet holder base has a 1/4 thread and arca quick release plate design, which can meet your shooting needs and is suitable for all tripods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tripod Mount
reviews.reviewText: I needed a quick and economical tripod adapter to hold my iPhone to capture video of a mechanical issue I’m trying to fix while working alone. This tablet/cellphone mount did the trick. It’s a weight weight sturdy plastic that securely holds an iPad or iPhone atop a conventional articulating photographic tripod. Expandable to various sizes from about 2-1/2” to 10”, locking button will make small 1/8” increments while a spring loaded action accommodates larger devices. Has rubber grip pads on both angled ends won’t slip out and avoids any scratches on a device. It opens enough to fit an iPad with a case on It. Standard screw mount 1/4-20 fits any common camera tripod. This is not a remote control type adapter, only an extension to allow using a tripod to hold devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, easy to use for both phones and tablets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great and holds our iPad.
reviews.reviewText: Attached to my tripod, the iPad is very top heavy and this holds it no problem. The spring is heavy enough and there is enough adjustability to hold a Pixel 6 and an iPad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work well with Z Fold 4 fully opened
reviews.reviewText: Keep in mind that this adapter is meant for a tablet and thinner phones. I can use it well with the Samsung Z Fold 4 in its case as long as I keep it fully open. The closed (folded) phone got a smidge too thick. I also love that the push button at the back makes it easy to adjust the width of the holder. Try not to get rough with it, though. I don't think it would withstand a sportive action movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product for the job
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product for my z fold phone and tablet. I ordered two of them and i highly recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits a phone with a case!
reviews.reviewText: I always have a case on my Galaxy S20 Ultra and S22 Ultra phones, so many of these holders just don't quite fit. They are either too tight or just not big enough. This will fit my phones with a case!Because this is designed for a tablet, when using it with a phone, you actually have a grip to hold it with one hand while you access the touch screen or buttons with your other. I like it when shooting a simple video in the horizontal position.With the tripod thread, I've used it with several tripod devices and have had no issues.While it might be designed for tablets, I think this is a great holder for the bigger phones and especially for those with cases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my iPad Pro with case.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a clip big enough to hold my 11” iPad Pro while leaving the protective case on. This is a sturdy piece that screws onto my desktop tripod. This setup makes my iPad the perfect height for zoom calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rigid, strong but bit awkward to adjust and mount
reviews.reviewText: Pretty well built but needs a strong tripod head if its to be used with large tablet and tilted. It holds the device but is clunky to secure it. Cold shoe sits on top of the locking knob so is a bit weird. reasonably priced on low end but didn't quite fit my specific need so returned it.
